name: Time to escape (itch) (D.I.G.)
description:
Time to escape. Alpha version of my sci-fi survival game.

A lot of interesting things are planned, so far it is more of a demo (although, theoretically, it is even possible to finish). In my plans:

Alpha 2: AI + weapons

Alpha 3: A feature that completely changes the gameplay

Alpha 4: Weather conditions, diseases, injuries

Beta 1: Improved graphics and environment

Youtube video
